topic.title: HPE Helion 2.0 Development Platform: ALS Command Reference: Service Plans

ul.li: helion hide-service-plan: Hide the specified service-plan from the named organization.
helion service-plan: Show the details of the specified service plan
helion service-plans: List all available plans of the supported services
helion show-service-plan: Make the specified service plan visible to the named organization.
helion update-service-plan: Update the target's knowledge of the named service plan.

section.title: Syntax
section.p: For more information, use the helion help or helion help [command] commands.

section.title: helion hide-service-plan <name> <organization>
section.p: Hide the specified service-plan from the named organization.

row.entry: The service provider. Use this to disambiguate between multiple providers of the same vendor/type.
The once-off target to use for the current operation.
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation.
Path to an existing and readable file containing the targets and authorization tokens.
Name of the service type the specified plan belongs to.
The service version. Use this to disambiguate between multiple versions of the same vendor/type.

section.title: helion service-plan <name>
section.p: Show the details of the specified service plan.

row.entry: Print raw json as output, not human-formatted data.
The service provider. Use this to disambiguate between multiple providers of the same vendor/type.
The once-off target to use for the current operation.
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation.
Path to an existing and readable file containing the targets and authorization tokens.
Name of the service type the specified plan belongs to.
The service version. Use this to disambiguate between multiple versions of the same vendor/type.

section.title: helion service-plans
section.p: List all available plans of the supported services.

row.entry: Print raw json as output, not human-formatted data.
The once-off target to use for the current operation.
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation.
Path to an existing and readable file containing the targets and authorization tokens.

section.title: helion show-service-plan <name> <organization>
section.p: Make the specified service plan visible to the named organization.

row.entry: The service provider. Use this to disambiguate between multiple providers of the same vendor/type.
The once-off target to use for the current operation.
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation.
Path to an existing and readable file containing the targets and authorization tokens.
Name of the service type the specified plan belongs to.
The service version. Use this to disambiguate between multiple versions of the same vendor/type.

section.title: helion update-service-plan <name> <NewName>
section.p: Update the target's knowledge of the named service plan.

row.entry: Mark the plan as globally public.
The service provider. Use this to disambiguate between multiple providers of the same vendor/type.
The once-off target to use for the current operation.
The once-off authentication token to use for the current operation.
Path to an existing and readable file containing the targets and authorization tokens.
Name of the service type the specified plan belongs to.
The service version. Use this to disambiguate between multiple versions of the same vendor/type.
